ComicInfo.Title: Supergrrrl's Sidekick; Tales Of Young Doofus; Uncle Frankenstein; Hello To Hotfoot; Los Super Sonicos

ComicInfo.Summary:
The duck speaks.
Doofus reads Lord of the Rings to impress a girl.
Mario and Nona have to take lunch to Uncle Frank.
Olaf takes time off to go to a gig.
A superhero family.
After driving down the Pacific Coast Highway, Lewis remembers childhood beach holidays.
Venus wants to impress at football in front of watching eyes.
